content.query:
CREATE CREDENTIAL [cosmossalvadodem]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'wLdsEGGmpG0GH9BJkMHhrOFBjC4hIjgXnLv7sXBMiDK6pGLSceLI3j1XvFv1wboItjV3RaM9oqs3ACDbpBH1eQ=='


SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmossalvadodem;Database=CosmosDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'Products',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmossalvadodem'
) AS [Products]


SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET( 
       'CosmosDB',
       'account=cosmossalvadodem;database=CosmosDemoDB;key=wLdsEGGmpG0GH9BJkMHhrOFBjC4hIjgXnLv7sXBMiDK6pGLSceLI3j1XvFv1wboItjV3RaM9oqs3ACDbpBH1eQ==',
       Products
    ) AS [Products]


AccountEndpoint=https://<database account name>.documents.azure.com:443/;AccountKey=<database account master key>;
'account=cosmossalvadodem;database=Products;key=<wLdsEGGmpG0GH9BJkMHhrOFBjC4hIjgXnLv7sXBMiDK6pGLSceLI3j1XvFv1wboItjV3RaM9oqs3ACDbpBH1eQ=='
